main event: The witness and another person observed an intense red, flashing object that maneuvered differently than a plane on the Chaparosa Ranch in Jim Hogg County, Texas on November 21, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as an intense red, flashing-like object that the witness initially thought was a plane.
The object maneuvered differently than a plane or aircraft.
Later, an aircraft came flying from the direction of the object, appearing to have increased speed and altitude, as if chasing the object.
The object was gone within a few minutes after the aircraft appeared.
The witness noted that the characteristics of the light, such as the intensity and blinking, were the same before it seemed to be on top of the object.
sighted object: an intense red, flashing object that maneuvered differently than a plane
location: Chaparosa Ranch, Jim Hogg County, Texas
